post:
This Halloween Season, [King-Servers.com](http://King-Servers.com) is thrilled to announce huge discount on its Unparalleled & high-performance VPS Hosting Plans. Use **hallo40** Coupon Code and get **40% Discount** the first month’s payment of any VPS Hosting Plan.

King-servers VPS Hosting are ideal for medium seized websites/applications that require dedicated system resources, reliable platform and high speed network. With 99.9% Uptime SLA and no contract billing option, King-servers.com offers virtual servers for any budget.
To place order for any of our VPS Hosting Plans, log on to: http://king-servers.com/en/servers/vps/

**VPS Hosting (Russia, USA & Netherlands)**
> CPU: E5-2620 2.0Ghz - 1 core
> RAM: 256 MB
> HDD: 5 GB SSD
> Bandwidth: 500 GB
> Monthly Price: $5.00 / month

40% Discounted Price: $3.00
Enter coupon code hallo40 on the final checkout page for 40% discount on this server.


To check our full range of VPS Hosting Plans, click here: [VPS Hosting](http://king-servers.com/en/servers/vps/)


Why choose King-Servers.com?

1) 100% controlled decisions for DELL and SuperMicro servers
2) Servers in multiple locations: USA, NL & Russia
3) 24x7x365 days efficient support by professionals
4) 99.9% Uptime SLA
5) Monitoring of all servers 24/7
6) 1 Gbps Uplink port.
7) Data center in USA, Netherland& Russia
8) Choice of operating System and control panel

Don’t wait up and order now before the servers are out of stock. For any information, send an email at sales@king-servers.com.
